pages.name: Hint #13
pages.text: In winding maze or raiders hoard, a haunted taste is your reward. Sweet it seems, but take with care. This eerie treat has a deadly snare.$(br)$(br)See the next page for the answer.

pages.title: Answer #13
pages.text: Find the spooky jam in a loot chest from a maze or a Pillager encampment.
